cmd: CURL -X POST "http://127.0.0.1:4000/proxy/redirect?__env=dev&__envauth=Basic c29hanM6QzAzYmhnVWhSeEx4bUhURjFNUkFsVnh5Zi1VMzNNQXNnV2Y=&proxyRoute=%2serviceName%2FapiName" -d '%data that should be provided to the proxyRoute%'

fields.notes: contains the code of the environment to redirect to.
contains the soajsauth of the environment the calls is redirected to
contains an encoded value of the service/api to redirect to in the requested environment
